OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE FEDERATION OF WOMENS INSTITUTES (SYFWI)

Desc.entry: Umbrella organisation for local Women's Institutes in rural South Yorkshire providing a friendly atmosphere where women can be inspired and enlightened. Organises a variety of activities including drama, music, handicrafts, home crafts, walking, bowls, tennis and keep fit. A registered charity.

ContactName.entry: Mrs J Threadgold, Federation Secretary/Mrs Anne Fairclough, Federation Chairman
